DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess responder rate define achievement primary goal Goal Attainment Scale follow one BoNT-A injection cycle accordance routine practice .
DOC.brief_title: To Document Effectiveness BoNT-A Injection Adult Subjects With Upper Limb Spasticity Following Stroke
DOC.criteria: Upper limb spasticity follow stroke At least 12week interval last injection ( BoNTA BoNTB ) inclusion Decision already agree inject BoNTA Agreement subject goal set Contraindications BoNTA preparation
